list.comment:
SERVING FACE FACE FACE

So over the last year or so, I've been lucky to have the opportunity to have a lot of time dedicated to self-reflecting and thinking about what direction I want to go in life both in my creative career, my personal life and how to execute that direction. Because of this, I've finally achieved some goals of mine such as finally performing on stage, creating larger scale works, wearing looks out and about and I owe it all to the perspective I gained from this self-reflection (which ask any of my friends and it is all I talk about)! Lucky for me, @nab asked me to create this work inspired by their Talk to Yourself Experience, an online tool which creates a visual portrait of yourself based on different words you type or say verbally! They want people to take time to discover what they want most from their life because when you know what you really want, that’s when they can really help you get there and, in this case, visualise it! So my portrait has hearts, lightbulbs, and crayons because I want to keep working roles that I love but also to push new ideas and be as creative as possible! Which creating this has really helped in doing!

So check out the tool if you want to work out what you want and try something fun!
Hope you are all well! #spon

I SCREAM FOR (dropped) ICE CREAM!

So this is what I wore for my performance at @honchodisko on Thursday! Thanks to my friends that did come, I'm so glad I finally broke the performance seal so thanks to John and Stevie for letting me occupy the stage that most of peers have done before!

Anyway, I did a lip sync to my pal @washingtongram song Rich Kids, which everyone said was s very me thing to do. So if anyone wants to see at least clips of it, let me know and I can harass my friends for what they recorded!
Anyway, I'm hoping to do more full looks more often now so let me know if you like them!

Hope everyone's weekend is going well.

CROCHET TIM TAM!

For those who don't know, in Australia we have these biscuits called Tim Tam which are a biscuit covered in chocolate! If you bite off each end and use it like a straw with milk or any other beverage, its called a Tim Tam Slam! So given the opportunity, I got to make a giant crochet version of a #TimTamSlam!

So the guys over at @arnottsbiscuits and @timtam are encouraging people to #sharetheslam (like I will for @petschack @patrickhsds and @ihateprozac ) #collab
Anyway, I hope everyone is well!

RAMEN BOWL REVEAL(?!) So like I said the other day super excited to reveal (no pun intended) this ramen bowl dress!

@uniqloau has a large range of Uniqlo graphic t-shirts to help express who you are, how you feel and there is always a constant update of new collections for you to try! So I figured what else to pair with the new ramen noodle collection t-shirts than a ramen dress inspired by the design on the shirt itself! I really liked how colorful it was and how I could translate it to a new reversible artwork!

Anyway, I hope everyone really likes it, I like how it turned out!

#ad #uniqloau

Girl look how orange you look girl!
I've always wanted to do some sort of big can outfit and lucky for me @cocacolaau asked for this new crochet Coca-Cola can outfit to celebrate the launch of their new limited edition Orange No Sugar flavour! Perfect for Aussie winter #spon

BURRRRRR-ITO'S COLD IN HERE, THERE MUST BE SOME TACOS IN THE ATMOSPHERE

So here's a 🌯 or 🌮 or just a wrap but either way I wanted to make some sort of tear away/reveal sort of outfit and I kinda like how this video turned out!

Hopefully you all like it somewhat haha hope everyone's well.

ITS STILL MY BIRTHDAY SOMEWHERE RIGHT?! 🎂🎂🎂 Anyway I did check, it's still the 4th of November somewhere so it's not over yet, but this is how much I got done of this spaghetti look for my birthday before I get back to being busy with work again!

Thanks for people who sent me nice messages, it was a wholesome weekend in Adelaide with @raman_ugh which I haven't had in a while!
Anyway, this isn't quite done but I figured I'd post something at least, hope you're all well!

ITS SOMEONES BIRTHDAY SOMEWHERE 🎂🎂🎂🎂 So I realized there's a few things I've made and never made proper posts for! So here's a very dated tiered cake outfit I made for my birthday last year!

I guess I never uploaded it because I uploaded another clip but I'll see how I go about back posting all these other things!

Anyway, hope y'all are well.

So yesterday I posted the first two pieces I made for fundraising for the KFC Youth Foundation and here is the last one! I always wanted to make a fried chicken bucket hat and lucky for me I had a great excuse to make one! Though obviously I'm not keeping this one, this one is something you can buy on the link in my bio, which also will contain many other bits of merch that you can buy!

Anyway, I hope you liked the things I made, and I hope one of you buys the hats I've made!

#sp #webackyouth @kfcaustralia

RAMEN BOWL (CUT) 🍜🍜🍜 So I'm super excited to show everyone these latest things I've been making! @uniqloau has a ever changing collection of shirts and for their latest collection, it's all ramen themed! So they asked my to make some pieces to go alongside the new shirts to show them off!

Anyway, I have something else just as fun coming up too so keep an eye out! Hope you all had a good weekend!

#ad #uniqloau

Oh You Know I'm Packing (chips) 😉🥔🥔🥔🥔🥔 So at least a year ago I saw a photo of @sashavelour wearing a felt(?) cape and I photoshopped it to look like a potato chip packet, and ever since then I was always wanting to make a giant potato chip packet cape that revealed to a chip dress! I know a lot of you didn't recognize what I was crocheting this whole time, but hopefully it makes more sense now!

Hopefully you all like it, I've also recorded twice for a YouTube video but I haven't liked what I made so I'm gonna re record again tomorrow and hopefully have a video up on the weekend!

Anyway you'll see a bit more soon!
Hope y'all are well x

So I posted earlier the first of my three pieces I made for the KFC Youth Foundation, here’s the second! I've always wanted to do a fried chicken leg, especially after I had made the first one many years ago! Though lucky for someone will be able to buy this one for themselves! Who wouldn’t want an Original Recipe hat. You can buy it on the link I'll put in my bio tomorrow at 12pm!

#sp #webackyouth @kfcaustralia
